mapper.insert: insert into t_child_refraction_screening ( `history_id`, `righteye_diopter_s`, `righteye_diopter_c`, `righteye_diopter_a`, `lefteye_diopter_s`, `lefteye_diopter_c`, `lefteye_diopter_a`, `righteye_dengxiaoqiujing`, `lefteye_dengxiaoqiujing`, `ou_pd`, `os_pd`, `od_pd`, `righteye_result_type`, `righteye_result_ins`, `lefteye_result_type`, `lefteye_result_ins`, age, check_date, child_idcard ) values ( #{historyId}, #{righteyeDiopterS}, #{righteyeDiopterC}, #{righteyeDiopterA}, #{lefteyeDiopterS}, #{lefteyeDiopterC}, #{lefteyeDiopterA}, #{righteyeDengxiaoqiujing}, #{lefteyeDengxiaoqiujing}, #{ouPd}, #{osPd}, #{odPd}, #{righteyeResultType}, #{righteyeResultIns}, #{lefteyeResultType}, #{lefteyeResultIns}, #{age}, #{checkDate}, #{childIdcard} )
